events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your submission shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specialized in engineering hiring has been assigned to your case and will contact you soon.
Your profile has been screened and meets the minimum criteria; we would like to schedule a phone call to discuss your experience.
Thank you for getting back to us so quickly; you confirmed your availability for the upcoming initial screening call.
The technical interview has been scheduled for you on May 8th at 10:00 AM UTC; please prepare accordingly.
Your technical interview was successfully completed with positive feedback from the senior engineering team.
The human resources interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, with good alignment on your expectations and the company’s values and policies.
We are pleased to propose an offer for the Software Engineer role; please review the attached details and respond at your convenience.
We have received your feedback and are glad to hear that you are excited about the opportunity and terms we outlined.
Thank you for accepting the job offer; we look forward to welcoming you to the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with access to all necessary systems, documentation, and introductory meetings scheduled.
The hiring process is now complete, and we’re excited to have you officially join the engineering department.
